name: Butterfingers McGee
reason: Butterfingers attempted to steal the world's most valuable faberge egg, but dropped it.

name: Ravenous Reggie
reason: This ravenous man eats his roommate's food without asking.

name: Jerry the Vandal
reason: Jerry drives to construction areas all around town, and writes his name in the wet cement.
reward: An engraved plaque from the city council.
